vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πόπλιος, -ου, ὁ
(Latin), Publius: Act.28:7-8.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.28.7
§ Publius, "first"
Publius, (Proper name), Acts 28:7, 8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
部百流 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "受歡迎的"
米利大島的行政首長(徒 28:7-8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
部百流 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "受欢迎的"
米利大岛的行政首长(徒 28:7-8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Búp-li-u; Púp-li-u. nguồn gốc: tiếng La-tinh
